Package cards

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
cards.AbstractDeck
cards.Deck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Saveable
public class Deck extends AbstractDeck implements Saveable
Deck class contains a number of cards. Each player has a deck. Discard and draw piles are also a deck. A Deck can transfer cards to another deck.

    • createMainDeck

      public void createMainDeck()
      This method creates 108 cards. These 108 cards are all needed cards for a game. After creating, method shuffles and adds newly created 108 cards to this Deck. Therefore, this Deck becomes the draw pile.
      Specified by:
      createMainDeck in class AbstractDeck

    • addToDeck

      public void addToDeck(Card card)
      This method simply adds a Card to the Deck. The reason it is special is that all the other methods to add Cards to the Deck depends on this function.
      Specified by:
      addToDeck in class AbstractDeck
      Parameters:
      card - is the card we will add to this Deck.

    • addNumerousCardsToDeck

      public void addNumerousCardsToDeck(LinkedList<Card> cards)

      Specified by:
      addNumerousCardsToDeck in class AbstractDeck
      Parameters:
      cards - is a Linkedlist of Cards.

    • takeTheCard

      public Card takeTheCard(Card card)
      This method simply takes a Card from the Deck. The reason it is special is that all the other methods to take Cards from the Deck depends on this function.
      Specified by:
      takeTheCard in class AbstractDeck
      Parameters:
      card - is the card we will take from this Deck.
      Returns:
      the taken card. Null if card does not exist in the Deck.

    • cardHasCome

      public boolean cardHasCome(Card card)
      this method is for checking if a card matches the last card in this deck. If they match, new card is being added to this Deck. It is used for discard pile Deck.
      Specified by:
      cardHasCome in class AbstractDeck
      Parameters:
      card - is the new Card.
      Returns:
      true if cards match. False otherwise.

    • doesDeckHaveCards

      public boolean doesDeckHaveCards()
      Specified by:
      doesDeckHaveCards in class AbstractDeck
      Returns:
      true if deck is not empty. False otherwise.

    • takeAllBottomCards

      public LinkedList<Card> takeAllBottomCards()
      Takes all cards except the last one from this Deck. It is used for taking all bottom cards from discard pile Deck when Cards are finished in Draw Pile.
      Specified by:
      takeAllBottomCards in class AbstractDeck
      Returns:
      a linkedlist of cards taken.

    • takeTopCards

      Specified by:
      takeTopCards in class AbstractDeck
      Parameters:

    • cardsExchange

      public static boolean cardsExchange(Deck deckToTakeCards, Deck deckToGiveCards)
      When there is nothing left in the draw pile deck, this function takes bottom cards from discard pile Deck. Then adds them to draw pile Deck.
      Parameters:
      deckToTakeCards - Draw pile Deck
      deckToGiveCards - Discard pile Deck
      Returns:
      false if there is not any card to take from discard pile. True otherwise
